create.title: Add New Organizer
create.subtitle: Register event organizers to enable bib resale functionality for their races

basicInformation.title: Organizer Information
basicInformation.description: Enter the basic information about the event organizer to identify which races will be available for bib resale on the platform.

logoUpload.label: Organizer Logo
logoUpload.description: Upload the organizer's logo. Supported formats: PNG, JPG, SVG (max 5MB)
logoUpload.uploadSubtext: Drag or drop your files here or click to upload

form.partnerDescription: Partner organizers can enable bib resale for their events on the platform.

success.title: Organizer Created Successfully
success.message: The organizer '{organizerName}' has been successfully created.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.websiteInvalid: Please enter a valid website URL
errors.createFailed: Failed to create organizer. Please try again.

create.title: Ajouter un Organisateur
create.subtitle: Enregistrer les organisateurs d'événements pour activer la fonctionnalité de revente de dossards pour leurs courses

basicInformation.title: Informations sur l'Organisateur
basicInformation.description: Saisissez les informations de base sur l'organisateur d'événements pour identifier quelles courses seront disponibles pour la revente de dossards sur la plateforme.

logoUpload.label: Logo de l'Organisateur
logoUpload.description: Téléchargez le logo de l'organisateur. Formats supportés : PNG, JPG, SVG (max 5Mo)
logoUpload.uploadSubtext: Glissez et déposez vos fichiers ici ou cliquez pour télécharger

form.partnerDescription: Les organisateurs partenaires peuvent activer la revente de dossards pour leurs événements sur la plateforme.

success.title: Organisateur Créé avec Succès
success.message: L'organisateur '{organizerName}' a été créé avec succès.

errors.nameRequired: Le nom de l'organisateur est requis
errors.emailInvalid: Veuillez saisir une adresse email valide
errors.websiteInvalid: Veuillez saisir une URL de site web valide
errors.createFailed: Échec de la création de l'organisateur. Veuillez réessayer.

create.title: 새 주최자 추가
create.subtitle: 레이스에 대한 번호표 재판매 기능을 활성화하기 위해 이벤트 주최자를 등록하세요

basicInformation.title: 주최자 정보
basicInformation.description: 플랫폼에서 번호표 재판매가 가능한 레이스를 식별하기 위해 이벤트 주최자에 대한 기본 정보를 입력하세요.

logoUpload.label: 주최자 로고
logoUpload.description: 주최자의 로고를 업로드하세요. 지원 형식: PNG, JPG, SVG (최대 5MB)
logoUpload.uploadSubtext: 파일을 여기에 드래그 앤 드롭하거나 클릭하여 업로드하세요

form.partnerDescription: 파트너 주최자는 플랫폼에서 이벤트에 대한 번호표 재판매를 활성화할 수 있습니다.

errors.createFailed: 주최자 생성에 실패했습니다. 다시 시도해 주세요.
